/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings and lush green trees, creating a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene backdrop to the busy street below. The street itself is filled with cars and buses, indicating a well-connected transportation network. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, a common sight in many urban areas. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
